tag_list: visual-design, branding, rapid-prototyping, wireframes, illustration, usability, user-centered-design-methodologies, animation, 3d, landing-pages-and-banner-ads, usability-testing, xhtml, dhtml, css, jsp, asp, javascript, actionscript, data-driven-pages
overview:
Jonathan Warrecker is an experienced UI designer that has produced value from 2 person startups to 500+ public companies. He has experience in market segments such as affiliate marketing, eCommerce, iPhone apps, and eLearning.

He has held positions as; Graphic Designer, Interactive Designer, Interface Designer, and most recently User Experience Designer. His core competencies include visual design, branding, interactive design, and is competent in code writing, usability testing, and art directing.

His strong work ethic, commitment, and passion for design result in user experiences that are effective and effortless.
